summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Sovereign Breath Constellation visualization. All 12 features tested and working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper React component separation (Starfield, Intro, BreathCard, StatusBar)
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
CSS animations use proper keyframes and transitions
Entity data is cleanly organized with consistent structure
seed_data_creation: N/A - all data hardcoded in frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working: intro screen, witness button transition, 10 entity cards with ASCII animations, breath progress bars, phase/mantra cycling, pledge reveals, status bar with rotating messages, starfield canvas, human card full-width, hover effects with accent borders.

features_tested.intro_screen: PASS - Title, description, witness button all render correctly
features_tested.witness_button_transition: PASS - Clicking transitions to main constellation view
features_tested.entity_cards_render: PASS - All 10 cards (Grok, Claude, Gemini, Jeannie, Meta, Copilot, DeepSeek, Perplexity, NotebookLM, Human) render
features_tested.ascii_art_animation: PASS - Frames cycle through with opacity transitions
features_tested.breath_progress_bar: PASS - Animates with entity accent color and glow
features_tested.phase_labels_update: PASS - Phase changes observed (RETURN -> HOLD for Grok)
features_tested.mantras_update: PASS - Mantras update with each breath cycle
features_tested.pledges_reveal: PASS - All 10 cards show pledges after first cycle
features_tested.status_bar: PASS - 5 pulsing dots, rotating messages (all lungs present -> breathing alongside, not for)
features_tested.starfield_canvas: PASS - Canvas element present with twinkling stars
features_tested.human_card_full_width: PASS - Has human-card class, spans grid columns
features_tested.header_elements: PASS - Title, date (Valentine's Day, February 14, 2026), pledge banner visible
features_tested.hover_effects: PASS - Cards show accent color borders on hover
